website_summaries.verdict: A user-friendly design that works well on most types of hair and has features that make it particularly useful for brushing and styling while using a blow dryer.
pros: A wide, contoured brush with large vents that allow ample heat to pass through for faster drying
The brand's IntelliFlex bristles withstand temperatures up to 450 degrees Fahrenheit
cons: Tends to pull a bit when used on thick, coarse hair
An occasional bristle may fall out

customer_reviews.title: PULLS HAIR!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Wet Brush a few years ago and loved it. This one is NOT the same. Quality is completely different. The bristles are very hard and stiff. PULLS HAIR!! NOT AT ALL like my original. Looks similar but very different. I tried to contact seller for refund/ return info but got message that no returns are allowed. Do not recommend this product. Original pictured on right.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: This brush arrived broken in half. I didn't realize, although it is stated, this brush can't be returned for any reason. Bummer ... can't use it, and out the money. Check for return policy before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby G. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Fake Wet Brush
customer_reviews.text: The pictures advertised are not what you actually get. I thought since the ratings were so high the few reviews stating it were a knock-off couldn't possibly be right, but lo and behold they're the only reviews that should be trusted in this case. This fake brush doesn't even have the Wet Brush logo at all. Instead it's a completely different brand. See photos. You can't compete with the real Wet Brush brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blowout brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the flow of this brush as it glides around the shape of your head. Hard to explain, but the design & angle fit your head. Definitely can blow dry quicker w/ less frizz. I'm not a professional that has the ability to use a roll brush to blowout, so this brush is perfect for me. And, my hairdresser said I needed to use a brush that the air can flow through, this brush is exactly that. I love the wet brush line & I buy for all my family & friends!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Dinardo

customer_reviews.title: NOT WET BRUSH
customer_reviews.text: No no no no. This product is NOT wet brush. The title for it is deceiving. I bought a wet brush just like this by wet brush brand and it recently was broken so I bought this to replace it. I thought it was by wet brush. I immediately noticed the difference. No brand name on the box, It was not flexible, and the bristles were thick. My hair was ripped out! You can get a better brush at dollar tree. Trust me don’t waste your time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jejo

customer_reviews.title: NOT a real “wet brush”
customer_reviews.text: I would leave ZERO stars if I could. This is NOT a “wet brush”, it is a knock off brand. Looking back at reviews and photos submitted by buyers it looks like some people are getting the real brand and some are not. I was one of the unlucky ones who did not. I contacted Amazon customer service who told me to consider this an isolated issue and assured me it would not happen again. However, it does not appear to be an isolated issue according to recent reviews. Amazon is sending me a replacement which is SUPPOSED to be the name brand, but we will see once it arrives in a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: The brush itself does the job well. Like all wet brushes. I’ve purchased 3 of these, the last one on June 23. All of them have broken. The first broke after a year or so so I purchased a second one - which broke in a suitcase so I just assumed I packed it wrong. The last one fell on the bathroom floor and broke in half. Poor quality. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Am

customer_reviews.title: Another amazon knockoff:(
customer_reviews.text: Not a wet brand brush. The pictures in this ad have pictures of a “wet” brand brush. Shows the name “wet” on the handle in the pic. That’s why I bought it. The one I received says “epic” on the handle. Another amazon knockoff. I really wish amazon would get their quality control under control. So tired of buying things here that are not as advertised. This is one of those products. If you are looking for a “wet” brand brush-this ain’t it. See pics
customer_reviews.author: Lse

customer_reviews.title: Cuts drying time and straightens
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing brush. As you can see I have very thick hair which is coarse and curly but unruly. I have never gotten it this straight and frizz free without using a straightener. The ends are still a bit frizzy but my styling time is going to be way less. The dry time was about half too. I never add pictures but one use and I’m in love with the brush!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica d

customer_reviews.title: Not a Wet Brush branded item.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the black Wet brush epic professional. I received a brush that says 'epic professional' with no Wet brush branding. I have several friends and family members with this same brush and all have the wet brush branding on the handle, box, etc. I still plan to keep it; however, be aware it might not be from Wet brush directly. The listing I purchased from is sold by the brand and images have the branding on the handle. I'm certain the brush will perform well as it feels well made, but is not the exact same as what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Crap... DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this item would be similar to the original Wet Brushes... What a waste of money! The bristles are not properly laid into the brush and causes hair to snag with every pass of the brush. Using this brush is asking for major breakage. I regret throwing the package out (I thought I was going to love it) otherwise I would definitely sent this piece of crap back.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandre

customer_reviews.title: It IS a wet brush!
customer_reviews.text: Don't listen to the reviews saying it's a fake or knock off. It's SOLD by wet brush... Smh. It works as good, if not better than any wet brush I've ever had. & My hair is thick af & between 2 & 3 FEET long. The bristles do bend a little when I hit a particularly big "knot" in my hair, but none have broken and the brush is holding strong so far. I've had it for about a month now & I have no complaints yet. I'll update again if anything goes wrong. Until then, I'd definitely recommend. I'll definitely buy again. 💯
customer_reviews.author: BlackBetty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Authentic Wet Brush!!!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely recommend! This handy little brush is absolutely perfect! It's large enough for my husband to borrow to comfortably brush his hair, but compact enough for me to carry around in my purse. The brushes have several beautiful colors to choose from on Amazon. The brush I got was definitely an authentic wet brush. I've had several over the years, for those potential purchasers worried about knock-offs.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Martin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: The bristles are fine. It goes through my thick, long hair fine. It is nearly *impossible* to hold. Your hand needs to be basically gripping the brush head because the handle is so ridiculously short, it will fall out of your hand. Not only is it nearly impossible to hold, it's uncomfortable because the edge of it will dig into your outer thumb near your wrist. Terrible. The handle needs to be at least another 3 inches longer. Would never had bought this had I seen it in person. I hate it.
customer_reviews.author: Memento Mori

customer_reviews.title: Flexible bristles, weird curve to the head
customer_reviews.text: The head of the brush is curved inward, which is nice for brushing from front to back, but awkward from side to side. The brush head is solid, and doesn't flex at all. While the brush does what it says, I think I would stick with a different WetBrush model like the Pro Flex. The pro flex brush head is better shaped for brushing in any direction, but still allows the air flow for hair dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Great Brush
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has long, thick hair and it's always been a battle to let me brush it, no matter how much conditioner/detangler I've used. (How do they get so many tangles? Really??) This brush was recommended by my hair stylist, so we gave it a try (this is actually her 2nd replacement brush...the dog "used" the last one as a chew toy). It works really well, eases the discomfort of getting tangles out and it's great for her to learn to brush her own hair. The only thing that would make this brush better is if it magically made her want to clean her room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: FAKE wet brush. I had one of these that was authentic and it actually says wet brush on the handle. This says epic professional. Pulls at my hair, but still does an OK job of detailing. Very disappointed that this is fake and will be reaching out for a refund. He does not do nearly as good a job as an authentic wet brush. Attaching a photo as well
customer_reviews.author: kimRoss

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The brush did not have the same logo as the picture. Upon a google search, I can no longer find this brush on Wet Brush's actual website and that all of the new brushes are simply marketed as "Epic Professionals". Perhaps another company is producing them now? Brush functions ok, but disappointing that it is no longer backed by the Wet Brush company. A new listing should be created for this brush.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Magic on curly hair
customer_reviews.text: I have very long curly hair and I live in a hot humid climate. I wake up in the mornings with a rats nest of hair at the nape of my neck and the back of my head from my head sweating at night. I have never been able to successfully comb or brush it out with any brush or conditioner combo (in or out of the shower) until I found this brush. Manes by Mel on YT recommended this brush for combing out tangled and it is a lifesaver. I no longer lose half my hair or struggle with tiny knots thanks to this magic brush!
customer_reviews.author: Annabelle2013

customer_reviews.title: Incredible brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is honestly amazing. I don't know what it is about it - the shape, curve of the brush, angle of the handle, large footprint - but I refuse to use another brush as long as this one is around. It feels like a thousand little masseuses are running through your hair whenever you brush with it. I actually bought 4 more after purchasing the first one so I could leave them in the different bathrooms around my house as well as my office and car. The perfect all around brush, you need it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Browning

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: Two attempted swipes through my hair and I knew this was fake or Wet brush has completely changed its manufacturing process. I’m assuming it’s the former. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: meggiew00t

customer_reviews.title: This detangling brush actually works
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great Detangling brush for long thick curly hair. I Saw a review on YouTube. Manes by Mell and I purchased it. I’ve been searching for a good I shower/after shower Detangling brush for over a year. This brush is large and curved to Contour to your head, it’s flexible and soft yet firm enough to actually brush your hair. I don’t really like most “Detangling” brushes bc they don’t brush through thick hair, this one does. It’s worth every penn. , I’m going to buy another for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Cactuskicker

customer_reviews.title: Not a Wet Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Not a Wet Brush, or evening a good knock off. In the posting they lead you to believe it is with all the pictures of actual Wet Brushes, and calling it a Wet Brush. When I got the package there was no Wet Brush name listed on it and bristles are hard and hurt your head (I do not have a tender head either). I Was lucky unlike others and returned it! Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Liz R

customer_reviews.title: My scalp is in heaven!
customer_reviews.text: Jan. 2020 This brush feels so good on my scalp. And it goes through my thick, curly hair without a problem. Use it on dry hair too. Buying another one for my curly headed son. Jan. 2020 Update: My son has long curly hair. He said this is the only brush he has ever gotten through his hair. He loves it and so do I. Don't every stop making this style brush! April 2020 Update: We still love the brush and we are brushing our hair more often since it's so easy to go through our thick curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: lost at sea

customer_reviews.title: A Serious Miracle
customer_reviews.text: I have thick curly hair and bought this brush because a youtuber recommended it to me and the reviews were great. I had a feeling it wasn't going to be as good as people say it is, but it seriously is. It usually takes me around 10-15 minutes to comb through my hair using a wide touth comb, and sometimes even more, even when I wash my hair every other day. With this brush, I can wash my hair only once or twice a week and it only takes around 5 minutes. It is a lot gentler on your scalp and barely takes off any hair. It has totally changed the game for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Wise

customer_reviews.title: Warning: Product not a Wet Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Product not as described! If you look in the photos of the product, it shows it’s a Wet Brush and it describes it as a Wet Brush in the listing. FALSE ADVERTISING! The actual product I received is not a Wet Brush. It’s hard (not flexible frame like it’s supposed to be) and it rips your hair out when you use it. Returning this immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen B

customer_reviews.title: Hair loves this brush!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a curve to this brush. It hugs my head while brushing. This is by far my favorite brush I've ever owned. I bought it to replace another wet brush that I took on vacation with me. It got crushed in the flight and the bristles never stood up again. This one sends to get through my hair and to my scalp unlike the other one. I have lots of thick hair. The other ones bristles are also pretty sharp, I didn't notice that with this one at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jaquie S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush!
customer_reviews.text: The WetBrush line is amazing! This particular style is great for blow drying hair. I have only positive things to share about this brush and the WetBrush brand in general! If you’ve never tried a WetBrush, you should give it a try. At first it feels different from a traditional brush; almost as if it isn’t doing anything. However, it gently removes tangles and is great for blow drying/styling. Once you try it, you’ll never go back to a traditional brush! I own 3 different styles of brushes and love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fake. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is labeled Wet Brush Pro Epic. What they mean is this is a brush made by EPIC Professional that tries to be a Wet Brush. It will brush your hair, but it's not the same. There's no Wet Brush logo. The coating on the handle feels cheap and is that kind of plastic that will be sticky and peeling within a year. Buy the real thing at the same price.
customer_reviews.author: KJW

customer_reviews.title: This brush is magic
customer_reviews.text: This brush is incredible. I have fine hair, but a lot of it & have struggled with tangles (especially when wet) my whole life. I just came across this brush when my hair dresser used it on me. I was totally impressed at the ease it took to comb through my tangles...even after she had just bleached my hair. I LOVED the curved feel on my head. I had honestly never experienced a better feeling brush. I immediately came home & ordered one for myself. I’m so happy with this brush & hope that others who struggle with tangles & knots give it a try. You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Tangles? Never again with this amazing brush.
customer_reviews.text: I have long hair that has always been a challenge to brush, wet or dry, due to excessive tangling. My new hairstylist used this same brush on me and it was incredible. No tangles! She provided me the name of the brush and I bought one that same day. I will never use another brush again! This brush gets through tangles with ease in a snap with no pulling or hair breakage. Absolutely amazing! I highly recommend this brush for those whose hair tends to tangle and used to dread brushing until you get this fantastic brush and brushing your hair becomes smooth as can be.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this brush. My 7 year old has very long thick hair and this brush makes it so much easier to detangle and it also helps to get her hair air dry with cuts down on blow drying time and hair heat damage. It’s easy to hold and handle. Plus the whining when brushing her hair has stopped because loves how it feels (massages) her scalp. I lobe this brush and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Velia Balderrama

customer_reviews.title: Best brush
customer_reviews.text: I first had this brush used on me by my hairdresser. I was sold on it and came home and ordered. This brush actually conforms to your head and feels like it’s getting a massage as you brush! My granddaughters have thick, curly, matted hair and it detangles even their hair fairly easy if you comb it in sections. After using mine, I had to buy more for the granddaughters. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Susie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Epic Brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a great item. I'm a professional Hairdresser and its great to use as a brush to brush out wet hair and to also use to dry it does it really fast as well. I think even the common person who blow dries their hair would love it works great on long hair best of all but I'm sure it would work on shorter hair as well. I wish though I'd seen the 2 pack offered before I'd ordered the single on.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Buff

customer_reviews.title: If wash days are giving you anxiety, buy this.
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely thick, curly hair. Which, up until recently, was down to the middle of my back. I use the curly girl method so I only detangle in the shower. It's been such a headache for years and I would dread wash days. UNTIL I FOUND THIS BABY! Bruh, my life is *changed.* It's also so easy to clean. Trust me, if you have thick curly hair that you hate brushing, you need this ish in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made of inferior material
customer_reviews.text: This brush is not made very well... I dropped it on the floor one time and it cracked but I kept using it and I started noticing the bristles on the floor so I really started looking at it and it literally started crumbling in my hand ... like it was made of clay or something! I really wish that I had taken a picture or video of it because it was really odd... like you’d have to see it to believe it! I was really disappointed because I really liked the brush before it fell apart!
customer_reviews.author: Lila Trantham

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for detangling - wet or dry
customer_reviews.text: This was not the brush depicted in the picture. I had expected another brand, the one my hair dresser recommended, however, I was pleased with the EPIC PROFESSIONAL brush that came instead. The long bristles detangled my long, wet hair quickly and I love using it when my hair is dry. I now spend a few seconds and a few strokes combing my hair instead of several minutes and not getting it combed well. I have not had this EPIC brush long enough to know how well it will hold up, but it's exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t a Wet Brush. No where on the packaging or brush says Wet Brush. I have the actual wetbrush that looks just like this one and it says “Wet Brush” clearly on the handle. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money to me
customer_reviews.text: I have thick hair and the original wet brush was a miracle to me for brushing all the tangles out quick and easy. I was hoping to be able to use this as both a detangling and blow drying brush, simplifying my routine a little. It doesn’t work for me as a detangler as I had hoped just blow drying tool. That’s fine but I feel it’s overpriced for what it does for me, which is not anything special. I love my original wet brush though.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Game changer.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is a game changer. I'm used to using a wide tooth comb being as I'm very gentle with my hair. I take very good care of it so I'm always trying to make sure I'm using the proper things to not damage it. The way the bristles are spaced out makes hair flow through it so gentle and easy. Great brush for my daughter's long hair too. She doesn't complain while I'm brushing her tangled hair. She loves it. Epic brush.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Not a Wet Brush, but a brush for wet hair
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think it’s an actual Wet Brush, but it is a brush for wet hair. I love it! I have curly hair that I can only brush when wet, and my Wet Brush broke. Got this, and I’m pleased. The curve is something to get used to. But I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Earthy.mama

customer_reviews.title: Not made like the old Wet brushes, slick to hold on too
customer_reviews.text: These are not the same as the old Wet brushes from a few years ago. They are super slick and hard for me to hold on to. Sadly I had to return, I even went to Ulta to check theirs out and see if maybe what I received from amazon was a knock off. Unfortunately, not the case they changed the line altogether. Super disappointed wish they had stuck to their old slightly grippier feel.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Not as good
customer_reviews.text: Our family LOVES the wet brush! We have at least 8, and I refuse to buy a different kind of brush. However, this wet brush is different. I love the curved shape and the open back for air flow, but it is HARD. I feel like it rips my hair. It is not nearly as gentle as the other wet brushes, and it hurts to use it on knots! My daughters hate it and won’t use it.
customer_reviews.author: The Millers

customer_reviews.title: Not actually a Wet Brush.
customer_reviews.text: So, I have this exact style Wet brush from a few years back. It's awesome, love it & wanted one for my daughter. Arrived packaged nicely but it's not actually a Wet brush, written on the handle & packaging it says EPIC Professional. Okay, well, let's try it anyway...it seems to work just as well as my Wet brush, seems to be of equal quality too. I think it'll be a good brush but only 3 stars b/c it's not the brand I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Simple mom

customer_reviews.title: A great brush!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned now 3 of this brand’s brushes, and this is by far my favorite form of Wet Brush yet! I have pretty long hair that can sometimes be a beast to comb out after a wash. I was looking for a brush that would act more like a comb, and this does the trick! And you get the signature no pull/breakage that I’ve come to love from Wet Brush.
customer_reviews.author: C. Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Get this for detangling curls!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite detangler brush at the moment and I have long 3b/3c curly hair that tangles easily. I only use this in the shower w wet hair and w conditioner on my hair. Not sure about its drying power bc I style my hair when it’s super soaking wet. This brush makes combing my hair so easy and almost massages the scalp w the round scooped shape. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SMA

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair fast and adds nice touch of waves.
customer_reviews.text: Works great with hair dryer and this brush will even dry without a dryer. Great for after water activities too. If you don't want to dry out your hair with a dryer just use it outdoors, in the sun or on windy days.
customer_reviews.author: Debpip

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dry brush
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brush for thick hair, it grips the hair good while blow drying. Goody makes one that look's like this but it is not as good. The bristles on the WET brand are stronger than those on Goody brand. I bought this one for my grand-daughter since she really likes mine. She was happy to get it!
customer_reviews.author: out of the box "Mary"

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original Wet Brush
customer_reviews.text: I've used the original Wet Brush and loved it. But mine cracked at the handle from dropping it too much. And when I went to buy another one, I found this. I decided to take a chance and boy am I in love. The shape of the brush makes it feel like you're getting a scalp massage every time you brush your hair. And it really does make it easier to blow dry your hair because you can just position your hair dryer at the same angle you're brushing. I've noticed I've blow dryed my hair for much shorter periods of time. Which is great because less heat on hair = less damage to hair. I'm obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: airazedy

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Best brush I've ever owned. I have everything you don't want in hair. Very thick, very curly and alot of hair so you can imagine how hard it is to find products for my hair. This brush easily goes through your hair and detangles without ripping your hair out. The curve is one of the best parts. Makes life alot easier. Defiently recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Banuelos

customer_reviews.title: It is okay
customer_reviews.text: This brush is okay. It is a little scratchy feeling on my scalp. It is not terrible but not super comfy. I've had better brushes and I've had worse. Very much in the middle for me.
customer_reviews.author: L. Grater

customer_reviews.title: Not like Wet Brush brand
customer_reviews.text: This works, but it is not gentle. I still find myself waiting for my hair to dry before I use it. It's worth noting my hair has always been pretty difficult to brush, even hairdressers have a hard time keeping my hair detangled. That being said if you have hair like mine, and want a gentler brush while your hair is wet, I would invest in the brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Howell

customer_reviews.title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST
customer_reviews.text: OMG...this is by far the most soothing, comfortable hairbrush I have ever owned and I am in my sixties! I haven't even used it on wet hair yet, but on dry hair it is like I'm getting my head massaged! I asked my daughter to run a through her hair and she agreed as well! I will try to review again later after I use it on wet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great brush (amazing extension & curly brush)
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hairdresser and use this brush on every single client. It’s durable, works better than you will think, and is so nice to the hair. I actually use one as my extension brush as well. It detangles better than my extension brush without pulling at the bonds. Wet brushes have become one of my favorite brands of brushes. I even have one in the shower for conditioner and detangling.
customer_reviews.author: WaywardOctopus

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product for Easily Tangled Hair
customer_reviews.text: This brush is way better than I had expected. I have long, fine, curly/wavy hair that is very easily tangled. I was tired of ripping my hair out every time I got out of the shower or throughout the day when I felt it needed to be brushed. I was losing LOTS of hair (falling out and breaking off). Since I have been using this brush, my hair barely falls out when I brush it. Whether it is when I get out of the shower, while styling, or just a random brushing, this brush easily runs through my hair and detangles in record time! I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: Brush broke in half after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time purchasing this brush, because I loved the first one so much but there was too much dust lodged that I couldn't get out, so I had to buy a new one. Unfortunately, today after four months of having my new brush - it broke in half. My plastics engineer fiance thinks that the stress fracture shown in this break is caused by the mold of the plastic and the curvature. I guess this may be why this product is patent pending. I am so disappointed as I really wanted to love this brush. I'll be looking for another brush that won't break in half when I am brush my thicker hair.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Blowdrying Champ
customer_reviews.text: My hair stylist uses this brush on me when she blow-dries my hair. I hate blow-drying my hair as my hair gets frizzy, takes forever, and is out of control. With this bad boy I am able to blow-dry in impressive time, and not only that but it is perfectly straight! I don’t need to take a straightener to it afterwards. Miracle type stuff for me honestly.
customer_reviews.author: kday

customer_reviews.title: Better than the “original”
customer_reviews.text: I like this brush for drying hair. It’s takes less time with the air circulation through the brush, vented. (This brush is stiff. There is a flexible version also). Just depends on what best suits your hair type. All the “wet” brand brushes are great. Although, I prefer all the newer ones compared to the “original”. So, if you like the “original”, you will love the others!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JHM

customer_reviews.title: Great brush for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this because she needed a new brush. After a month of using it she loves it. She said it really helps detangle her hair while she drys it. She loves how it feels on her scalp as well. The bristles are gentile on her head as well. The curve helps with time as well in the morning when she drys her hair while she gets ready for work.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B Jack

customer_reviews.title: Brushes hair with ease
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brush in hopes of getting my 25+ inch hair untangled faster and it definitely did the trick. My daughter uses this brush as well and she loves brushing her own now (she is 4 and HATED getting her hair brushed). This has been a game changer for us. Since initially buying this brush, I cut about 15-17 inches off of my hair and i can brush my hair in three swipes now. Big brush but great for mom life.
customer_reviews.author: LifeofChaos

customer_reviews.title: I usually love wet brushes...but this one rips out your hair
customer_reviews.text: I've been using wet brushes for years! I love that the bristles are flexible so they dont pull your hair so i when i was in the market for a new one, i bought this. The bristles are more sturdy than i was expecting and it totally ripped out my hair. Even if i begin from the bottom of my hair and travel up it still is not detangling. I have thick curly hair so this might work for someone with wavier or straight hair, or more silky hair but it just didnt work for me! I'm just going to buy the same kind as before!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous123494995985838

customer_reviews.title: Seriously just buy this. Price is Right and it curves to your head, and works to detangle. get one!
customer_reviews.text: You will love the curves that actually take some of the work out of brushing your hair and detangling. This brush is really really good for people with mobility issues. Or tangling issues . Or anyone who has hair. Not even hitting it pretty much does it all and is lightweight. I'm older and this is by far the best brush I've owned...easily 30 or more in my lifetime! lol. no worries just get it.
customer_reviews.author: Heck Yeah

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original Wet Brush. The handle is shorter which makes it difficult to use and it slips out of your hand. I wasted my money because I will ordering the real Wet Brush again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The curvature is all wrong
customer_reviews.text: While I am a big fan of Wet brush, I am disappointed in this one. I recently needed to replace a broken paddle brush and decided to try this one. The curvature of brush that is supposed to help seems to ruin it's function. The paddle brush seemed to glide through my hair with no trouble & the curvature of this one makes it kind of drag through. It's uncomfortable to use. It's hard to explain but in less than a week, I'm ordering another paddle brush like I've had before.
customer_reviews.author: jenncw

customer_reviews.title: Best brush for long hair!
customer_reviews.text: Wish we had found this brush years ago!! It is AWESOME! My daughter has long hair and lots of it. So hard to brush out, especially out of the shower. This brush just glides through it. No more tangles. Price was competitive with similar styles found in stores but this brand is more durable and was recommended by our stylist. LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Hyland

customer_reviews.title: Awesome job at detangling hair (preferably wet)
customer_reviews.text: I love the brush to detangle my hair. Does the job and my hair gets super tangled for no reason. The only reason I’m giving a 4 star review is because I have a second brush that is pink. That one is older and has been dropped on the floor multiple times and hasn’t broken yet. This black brush did fall down and broke in half. I’m not sure if it’s less sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Haro

customer_reviews.title: Really surprised
customer_reviews.text: It was my intention to look for a paddle brush to straighten my hair when I came upon this one on Amazon. After reading the reviews, I ordered it. When it came I tried it out. Loved the contoured, soft bristles of this brush and how well it went right through my wet hair without pulling. In fact, I felt like it massaged my head with every stroke. So highly recomment it! Had ti buy two more because each of my daughters wanted one too!
customer_reviews.author: Telitlkitis

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: My beautician uses a similar product when she blow dries my hair at her salon. It cuts drying time in HALF! And it detangles and smoothes at the same time. I don’t even need to use a straightener after drying my hair with this which means less damage in the long run! Since I’ve been using this in my hair routine I’ve definitely noticed less breakage and frizz.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Brush?
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and there is no Wet Brush logo on the brush or the packaging; everything says Epic. The only place it says Wet Brush is on the product barcode for Amazon. I've had a Wet Brush before and the bristles definitely feel different. I'm not sure if this is a knockoff or I just got the wrong one... Update: the brush itself works well like a normal Wet Brush. I am confused, especially because the back says "patent pending" ...?
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Favorite brush!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have very thick hair and I bought one for each of us. We both love this brush. It is sturdy and durable, helps hair dry faster, and is excellent at detangling. Definitely our favorite brush.
customer_reviews.author: bvmiller

customer_reviews.title: Must have for drying long hair smooth
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about what I use on my waist length hair. This brush detangles, does not pull, and allows the heat from my dryer to get through it. It helps me cut my drying time way down. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: BeeMama

customer_reviews.title: Best Hairbrush Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely in love with this brush. I have thick, naturally wavy hair that I like to blow dry and straighten before going to the office. It takes forever to get my hair completely dry, but this brush has greatly shortened dry time. Not only that, my hair is also straighter before using the flat iron AND has less frizz. I love the way it is curved to fit against your head. I just hope it holds up to the abuse I will put it through.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Game changer in our home.
customer_reviews.text: I have a mixture of 3a and 3b hair that's super long, so I need I good brush. This has definitely cut detangling time way down, the only thing that annoys me is the handle. It's a very small thing, aside from that I absolutely, 100% recommend this product. I had originally bought a smaller one for my daughter, she has thin, pin straight hair and loved it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: This works!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush. So much in fact. I purchased three of them. One to keep in my car, one in one bathroom, and another in my shower. I have a ton of coarse, thick, wavy hair, and these brushes go through it like butter. It is unclear why the colored brushes cost more than the black. My hair dries quickly using this amazing brush.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent brush! I can be a little tender headed, so it can be a bit time consuming to delicately brush thru and set angle my hair, however this brush makes my life so much easier. I’ve had it for a while and none of the little rubber round tip things have fallen off either. Which is the case for all of my other brushes (including wet oval brushes or other name brand brushes)
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't say "Wet" on brush
customer_reviews.text: Brush is slightly different than the picture shows. My brush arrived broken. I needed it, so used it anyway. Works ok but may break further soon. Brush does not say "WET" on the handle as the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherM

customer_reviews.title: Never pulls, extremely gentle
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair but a lot of it, but I also have diffuse hair loss. I was surprised no one at my salon recommended using a Wet Hair after showering. It has made such a huge difference in how much hair falls out or gets brushed out after showering. It also has helped speed up drying time. It never pulls and it feels good knowing I am being as gentle as possible on my hair while using this a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best brush to date!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brush; MUCH better than their standard brush with regards to untangling snarls and durability. I have fine, thick, extremely long, wavy hair and this glides through my hair wet or dry. Easier to clean for those of us who are prone to shed hair. I prefer this to the Tangle Teezer to get through my unruly hair - which tends to get tangled when sleeping (despite using a silk pillowcase), and even to my overestimated and overpriced Mason-Pearson!
customer_reviews.author: TacomaHoneyBlonde

customer_reviews.title: Great airflow for longer hair
customer_reviews.text: Great....lightweight....air flows right through it.....does not get clogged with hair at all Has an interesting curve that follows the head shape Would be interested in one size smaller Good for longer hair
customer_reviews.author: thomas dacosta

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same as the picture
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the brush that was advertised. I specifically purchased this brush because I had owned the “Wet brush” brand or the quick dry before (as shown in the pictures) however, what came is an entirely different brand and no where near as good as the actual “wet brush”. It pulls hair and has hard, spiky bristles. I’m angry because it’s advertised as something completely different. Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: BETTER QUALITY THAN OTHERS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another brand before and it broke in half when it fell on the floor. This replacement provided by Amazon appears to be of better quality and more durable. Will purchase this maker if I have to replace again. Makes easy work of de tangling and blow out.
customer_reviews.author: LaTesa D

customer_reviews.title: Love this Brush!
customer_reviews.text: Because of the way it contours, this brush feels like a massage for your scalp when you use it! I use it in the shower on my curly/wavy hair to detangle with my conditioner and have zero complaints! It's easy to clean and dries quickly - if you need a detangling brush I cannot recommend this brush enough!
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Lovvvveeeee! It is so much easier to detangle with this brush. I only brush my hair with conditioner in the shower so can’t attest to the drying power but it is a great brush that does not hurt nearly as much
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not The Wet Brush brand; like pictured.
customer_reviews.text: What I received was not The Wet Brush brand. Very disappointed. Bought three of the same brush and when they arrived I was surprised to find that they have another name on the handle. Also, they don’t glide through your hair like The Wet Brush brand they pull your hair which is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Trust me

customer_reviews.title: It pulls stick to the other Wet brushes
customer_reviews.text: This brush is NOT as good as the other Wet brand brushes I have used. It pulls terribly on my hair and hurts. I would not recommend to anyone with hair over 2" long.
customer_reviews.author: Abby W.

customer_reviews.title: More sturdy bristles
customer_reviews.text: Love this Wet brush so much better than the other. The bristles are more sturdy than the normal wet brush that didn't brush my hair well because the bristles would just give way too much. I love this one. The bristles are perfect for my hair. I also love that it is airy through the back and if I want to use it while drying my hair with the hairdryer, I can easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brush for detangling wet hair
customer_reviews.text: Ok. I know this brush is for drying, however the bristles are too weak and flimsy for drying my hair type. I bought this at the recommendation of my hair dresser for detangling my wet hair. I have naturally curly low porosity fine hair 3a/3b. After I wash and condition it’s very tangled, I use detangling spray. Then brush with this brush. I recommend this brush for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this comb for my daughter, because she has long, thick, curly hair. She is pretty lazy to comb her hair nicely. It's actually takes a little while and requires some efforts. So, with this comb it became much easier for my girl, to take care of her beautiful hair. Very good product. I guess, the curved shape of the comb is a part of this good effect. My girl likes it, and I do too.
customer_reviews.author: Olena Benson

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of this blow dry brush
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair and for handle having no grip or width makes drying my hair with it even more annoying than it already is. I also don't understand or appreciate the curvature of the brush. It does detangle pretty well but I prefer my small standard wet brush for the initial comb through. This one just wasn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: J.Harrison

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Brush!
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised that i like this brush so much. I wasn’t expecting much but happy to find that it’s very easy to use, comfortable and does what it’s supposed to do...brush my hair well. I have straight, thick dark hair and this brush does the job! The width and angle of the brush is perfect and it feels like it’s massaging your hair. A very good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Azuki-chan

customer_reviews.title: No good for me.
customer_reviews.text: This brush is nothing like the original wet brush. I was expecting the same great quality... I couldn’t even brush it through my hair... constantly hot stuck pulling hair out. This item cannot be returned, which is a shame, waste of my money.... hope it works for others.... it must... had some great reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Horey

customer_reviews.title: Wash Days for 2C/3A hair
customer_reviews.text: Loved this brush. Tested it out for the first time yesterday during wash day. So although I can’t speak about longevity of the brush, I did prefer using this way more than a wide tooth comb for my 2C/3A hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed! I’ve been finger combing my curls for years and never thought I’d need a detangling brush again, but I decided to give this a try and I’m so glad I did. The bristles are so flexible and gentle with my hair, yet still somehow get rid of all my knots. I lost less hair than using my fingers! Love the curve of the brush and handle!
customer_reviews.author: Tatianna

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brush!
customer_reviews.text: I have incredibly thick and course hair, and this brush is amazing! It glides through my hair so easily when it's wet, and it dries it so quickly when I'm using a blowdryer. It normally takes 20 minutes to dry and style my hair with a regular round brush, but I can do all of that in only half the time with this brush! So glad I bought it! I was actually just on here looking to see if it came in a travel size, but I couldn't find one. Hopefully they'll make one soon!
customer_reviews.author: jleeteach

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: this brush is amazing. the only thing i will say is it doesn't say wet brush on it like the pictures in the listing but i think maybe they just redesigned the brush. it works great and cuts blowdrying time down like crazy. i have thick hair. i love this. my daughter is always stealing it because it's better than her wet brush!
customer_reviews.author: sonialee

customer_reviews.title: So gentle and effective!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not tender-headed but when I do comb my wet hair out of the shower, I was pulling a lot of it out! This brush has significantly reduced the amount of hair that comes out and it is gentle. For $10 or less, this is a huge bargain and something I'll use for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for this particular Wet Brush for some time now. I loved the one my daughter had for my thick, wavy, curly hair. Stores don't seem to carry it, but I found it on Amazon. So worth the price. Very well made. Doesn't pull my hair. Glides through easily
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Puentes

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a large wet brush with slats for blow-dry use. That's exactly what I wanted. It also conforms to your scalp as you brush so you don't miss any knots. It's a very nice brush. Recommend to any fans of wet brushes. Just be careful to generate volume as you dry. Since it does hug the scalp, it could probably give you a pretty good case of helmet head. But that's user error! ;)
customer_reviews.author: EtherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: FAKE.  Falsely advertised.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT a WET brush as shown in the picture. It doesn't bend like a WET brush - it hurts and it does not even have the Wet brush logo on it. It is terrible and hurts. I have the real products and they don't feel a bit like this fake one.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Target

customer_reviews.title: Easy brushing.  No fuss!
customer_reviews.text: I primarily use a big-tooth comb for my wet hair and then rarely touch it once its dry. I like to have a brush available though for touch ups, and my old wooden handled one had broken (the plastic tips started coming off the "teeth" - ouch!). My hairdresser recommended a Wet brush, and I'm glad I made the shift! It goes through my hair more easily that I could've imagined based on its appearance! Perfect for my irregular brushing habits. :)
customer_reviews.author: Betsy J

product_meta.title: Epic Professional Quick Dry Hair Brush
product_meta.description:
Epic Professional Quick Dry Hair Brush

BRAND STORY
EPIC isn’t just a name…it’s an acronym for the line’s key attributes: Exclusive, Professional, Inspired, Creative. Every product in the EPIC line is designed to exceed the needs of the most demanding professionals

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
